member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Finder.IsValidTestMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified is a valid test method.
member.returns: True if the specified is valid.

member.name: M:SUnit.Discovery.Finder.FindAllValidTestMethods(System.Type)
member.summary: Finds all the methods on the specified type that are valid test methods.
member.returns: All methods defined on the type that are valid test methods.

member.name: T:SUnit.Discovery.FixtureFactory
member.summary: A method that is responsible for instantiating a Fixture.

member.name: P:SUnit.Discovery.TestCase.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the test method.

member.name: P:SUnit.Discovery.TestCase.Fixture
member.summary: Gets the type that the test method was declared on.

member.name: P:SUnit.Discovery.TestCase.Factory
member.summary: Gets the name of the factory method that will instantiate the fixture that the test will be called on.
